page.title: 12Bovis Building Area Trentham
page.content: In 1985 Bovis started building on the 7.5 acre plot.The plot used to be a farm. There are going to be 52 houses on the plot on Constance Avenue and Pacific Road .There is a 2.5 acre spare area in the middle which is going to be a park.There is a fault in part of the surface so they have put in hardcore after digging out a massive hole.The houses are quite big with twin garages.Some are bungalows.At the moment they have built 2 houses. They have brought in a lot of machinery like diggers and dumpers and lorries.They are leaving most of the trees to go in peoples gardens.The bushes will be chopped or burnt down.Bovis has built many of the houses in Trentham most of them are in Hunters Oak.
